value.name: Clifford Butler Jr.
value.description: 'This Is Trying On Your Soul': Possible Tornado Rips Roof Off Home -- Just 2 Years After Rebuild From October 2019 StormThe family's home had just been rebuilt after it was hit by the EF-3 tornado ...

value.name: Sheriff's deputy kills Oklahoma man who shot police chief
value.description: Officers from three agencies arrived and began speaking with Clifford Butler Jr. The state bureau says that as officers tried to subdue Butler, he pulled a gun and shot the Pond Creek police chief.
